reviewtext: Don't understand the problems that other folks had. It is just  memory and you should find out whether it is go/no-go right away. In this case, it is no fuss for my Olympus D460; it did not require formatting. Buy it You just cannot beat the price of $32 and no shipping from Amazon.com (for 32MB postage stamp size memory! I wanted to cry when thinking about the $500 that I paid for my first 40 MB external hard drive for my Mac!).
